select message_seq,message_from_id,message_to_id,message_type,message_content,message_regdate,c1.customer_name as message_from_name, c2.customer_name as message_to_name ,c1.customer_image as message_from_img, c2.customer_image as message_to_img, to_char(message_regdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') as message_date, to_char(message_regdate,'hh24:mi') as message_time from message m join customer c1 on m.message_from_id = c1.customer_id join customer c2 on m.message_to_id = c2.customer_id where (message_from_id = #{fromId} and message_to_id = #{toId}) or (message_from_id = #{toId} and message_to_id = #{fromId}) ORDER BY to_char(message_regdate, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') asc

select message_seq,message_from_id,message_to_id,message_type,message_content,message_regdate, to_char(message_regdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') as message_date, to_char(message_regdate,'hh24:mi') as message_time from message where message_from_id = #{toId} and message_to_id = #{fromId} ORDER BY to_char(message_regdate, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss') asc
